# minio_kms_key (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
# Create a KMS encryption key
resource "minio_kms_key" "example" {
  key_id = "my-encryption-key"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `key_id` (String) KMS key ID

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

```shell
# KMS keys can be imported using the key name
terraform import minio_kms_key.example key-name
```
